To me it doesn't matter if the guy or girl get what they deserve because at the end of the day it doesn't change the fact of what happened. All the main character has to do is keep living life and understand that the girl he was in love with and grew up with is dead. And the girl currently walking is a completely different person.

Madoka didn't love Harane and she only use him to her own ego. And that's the fuckup thing. She only care that he drawn her so she become this "beautiful thing" she see in the paintings. She even fuck him so he keep goin but he see trhouth this and destroy the painting.

And that child is not Harane's.

P.S. If you want to see another fuck up good hentai like this one, try A FORK IN THE ROAD 1 & 2, that one more fucked up, there is no punishment for the 'bad' guy.

Madoka love the Harane and never stopped liking him, but there were the temptation of sexual pleasure that threatened her away from him, but the feeling of guilt for having sexual relations with another man was stronger, she was taken by guilt and believe she was not involved with any other man, she kept loving the Harane, only the remoroso prevented her from approaching him again because she don't think of the harane and she if punish for having had sex with another man in front of him, moving away from the man she loves and not having sex with anyone else. Madoka cried at the end not believing as the Harane could love heads woman like her it would be unbecoming. 
Her daughter is of the Harane.
Ehhh can anyone tell whose child is that??

Admittedly, the art is very good and the story draws you in... and it seemed that the asshole got what he deserved (knife-in-back-pocket) but it sucks for the MC, unmarried and suffering for ED from all that trauma although if not for his paintings I think he would have been in a Psychiatric ward... The girl got the chance to move on with her life meanwhile the guy just got REKT! Life isn’t fair.
